# ControlGroupStyleConfiguration.Label

**Structure**

A type-erased label of a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/ControlGroup].

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency struct Label
```

## Configuring the label

- **label**: A view that provides the optional label of the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/ControlGroup].

- View
